#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<string.h>
#define MAX 10005
void part(char [],int ,int);
void merge(char [],int ,int,int);
int main()
{
	int t,la,lb; cin>>t;char a[MAX],b[MAX];
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		la=strlen(a); lb=strlen(b);
		part(a,0,la-1); part(b,0,lb-1);
		if(strcmp(a,b)) cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}

void part(char arr[],int low,int high)
{
	int mid;
	if(low<high)
	{
		mid=(low+high)/2;
		part(arr,low,mid);
		part(arr,mid+1,high);
		merge(arr,low,mid,high);
	}
}
void merge(char arr[],int low,int mid,int high)
{
	int j=low,m=mid+1,i;
	int temp[MAX];
	for(i=low;j<=mid  && m<=high;i++)
	{
		if(arr[j]<=arr[m])
		{
			temp[i]=arr[j]; j++;
		}
		else
		{
			temp[i]=arr[m]; m++;
		}
	}
	if(j>mid)
	{
		while(m<=high)
		{
			temp[i]=arr[m]; m++; i++;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		while(j<=mid)
		{
			temp[i]=arr[j]; j++; i++;
		}
	}
	for(i=low;i<=high;i++)
	{
		arr[i]=temp[i];
	}
}
